簙簙簙

簙字的基本解释

簙
bó
古同“博”，古代的一种棋戏。

簙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bó］
［《廣韻》補各切，入鐸，幫。］
古代一种掷采下棋的比赛游戏。

簙字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　簙； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页898第38
【廣韻】補各切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】伯各切，?音博。【說文】局戲，六箸十二棊也。【楚辭·招魂】菎蔽象棊，有六簙些。【註】投六箸，行六棊，故爲六簙也。【世本】古者烏曹作簙。【揚子·方言】簙謂之蔽，或謂之箘。秦、晉之閒謂之簙，吳、楚之閒謂之蔽。　又【類篇】匹各切。義同。　通作博。【論語】不有博奕者乎。

簙字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
簙字的起名意思

暂无。

Bo
Basic explanation of words
Bo
bó
Ancient Tong "Bo", an ancient chess game.
Bo
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bó］
["Guangyun" make up each cut, enter the priest, help. ]
An ancient game of throwing and picking chess.
Bo
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　 Bo; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 898 Page 38
[Guang Yun] Make up each cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Bo Ge cut,? Yinbo. [Said the text] Bureau play, six chopsticks and twelve chopsticks. [Songs of the Chu·Soul Recalling] There are more than six games. [Note] To vote for six chopsticks, to do six strokes, so it is also called Liubo. 【World Edition】The ancient Wu Cao Zuobo. [Yangtze Dialect] Bo is called "Zhi", or "Zhi". The leisure of Qin and Jin is called Bo, and the leisure of Wu and Chu is called concealment.　[Classes] Each cut. The same meaning.　Through blogging. [The Analects] There are no gamers.
